summary: This is an email chain from July 25, 2019, regarding a formal request to preserve video surveillance footage from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York. The request specifically seeks footage from the SHU tier containing cell Z06-215 from July 22, 2019, at 11 pm to July 23, 2019, at 4 am, related to the investigation of an incident involving Jeffrey Epstein. The email also references a prior visit with an inmate named Tartaglione.

persons.name: Tartaglione
persons.context: An inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York. The sender thanks the recipient for accommodating a visit with him and giving him extra time to review his discovery.

events.title: Epstein Incident at MCC
events.description: An incident involving Jeffrey Epstein that is being investigated, occurring during the early morning hours of July 23, 2019, at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC), New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: A formal preservation request was made on July 25, 2019, for video footage from the MCC related to an incident involving Jeffrey Epstein.
The requested footage is from the SHU (Special Housing Unit) tier containing cell Z06-215, from 11 pm on July 22, 2019, to 4 am on July 23, 2019.
The email references a prior visit with an inmate named Tartaglione at the MCC.
The request also seeks preservation of any body camera footage from responding officers that may have captured the inside of the cell after the incident.
